response.overview: A crazed backwoods religious cult leader relates three tales of horror: A young woman gets terrorized by a strange creepy man in "It's Hour Come Round," an obsessive college art professor creates a beautiful female sculpture that comes to sensuous life in "Galatea," and zombies run amok in "Day of the Living."
response.tagline: It Will Take You To The Edge Of Terror...And Leave You There!
response.title: Vault Of Darkness
